quotes.quote: What I look forward to is continued immaturity followed by death.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: The purpose of life is to fight maturity.
quotes.author: Dick Werthimer

quotes.quote: There's no point in being grown up if you can't be childish sometimes.
quotes.author: Doctor Who

quotes.quote: By the time I'd grown up, I naturally supposed that I'd be grown up.
quotes.author: Eve Babitz

quotes.quote: To be mature means to face, and not evade, every fresh crisis that comes.
quotes.author: Fritz Kunkel

quotes.quote: Every human being on this earth is born with a tragedy, and it isn't original sin. He's born with the tragedy that he has to grow up. That he has to leave the nest, the security, and go out to do battle. He has to lose everything that is lovely and fight for a new loveliness of his own making, and it's a tragedy. A lot of people don't have the courage to do it.
quotes.author: Helen Hayes

quotes.quote: Maturity is only a short break in adolescence.
quotes.author: Jules Feiffer

quotes.author: Kevin Smith

quotes.quote: Age is no guarantee of maturity.
quotes.author: Lawana Blackwell

quotes.quote: Adulthood isn't an award they'll give you for being a good child. You can waste... years, trying to get someone to give that respect to you, as though it were a sort of promotion or raise in pay. If only you do enough, if only you are good enough. No. You have to just... take it. Give it to yourself, I suppose. Say, I'm sorry you feel like that and walk away. But that's hard.
quotes.author: Lois McMaster Bujold

quotes.quote: When we were children, we used to think that when we were grown-up we would no longer be vulnerable. But to grow up is to accept vulnerability... To be alive is to be vulnerable.
quotes.author: Madeleine L'Engle
